data.title: Where is Duke University located?
data.meta_description: Hey there! Duke University is located in Durham, North Carolina. Durham is a medium-sized city that is part of the larger Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill area, also known as the Research Triangle. This region is known for its strong research, technology, and education sectors. Good luck with your application, and I hope this information is helpful!
data.text:
Hey guys, this might sound like a silly question, but can someone tell me in which state Duke University is located? I've heard great things about it and I'm thinking about applying, but I want to know more about its location. Cheers!

2 months ago

Hey there! Duke University is located in Durham, North Carolina. Durham is a medium-sized city that is part of the larger Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill area, also known as the Research Triangle. This region is known for its strong research, technology, and education sectors. Good luck with your application, and I hope this information is helpful!

2 months ago
